descriptions:
['DescriptionThis incredible two-bedroom apartment is part of the Vida Residences in Downtown Dubai, located on the bustling Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard.
The apartment is finished to the highest quality with a sense of flair that combines elements of classical Art Deco and a more modern design style. Grey and white form the palette, combined in playful ways to create a dynamic contrast. Open plan living is a key feature, which is further emphasized by floor-to-ceiling windows and a comfortable balcony. The latter extends out from the living area, creating a seamless connection between indoor and outdoor entertainment.
You will find the same play of white and grey in the open kitchen with its beautifully contrasting cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. Both of the bedrooms are very elegantly designed and filled with light, benefiting from built-in closets and smartly finished bathrooms,
These trend-setting residences will be directly linked to the Vida Downtown Hotel through an air-conditioned glass travellator, allowing residents access to top-class hotel amenities. Brimming with promise, these stylish apartments offer a swimming pool, fitness center, and a dedicated area for children set within the three-storey podium.  The development is located on the buzzing Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard which hosts high-end retail shops, classy restaurants, and chic cafes. The location is also in close proximity to the developing cultural hub at Opera District which will house the much-awaited Dubai Opera, which will serve as a multi-format venue for concerts, plays, and performances. With close proximity to Business Bay and the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC), living at Vida Residences Downtown gives you accessibility to both work and play.
This property is being offered to the market by a motivated seller and has a 2-year post-handover payment plan.
Please get in touch to view this apartment.']
